justification: “Subjective risk-attitudes were assessed before and after each block using visual analog scales.”

“Subjective satisfaction was collected to assess how participants rated their own strategies,” and participants “provided subjective ratings … by manipulating the slider on a visual analog scale (VAS).”

measured_by: Difference between observed mean RT/reach direction and Bayesian optimal value
justification: “The distortion from the optimal RT was then calculated as the objective risk-attitude,” likewise for reach direction in Experiment 3.

measured_by: Standard deviation of response time (SD of RT)
justification: “As an index of motor variability, the mean SD of RT was calculated using the SD of RT from session three to session eight for each participant.”
“First, as an index of motor variability, the mean SD of reach direction was calculated using the SD of relative reach direction from sessions three to six for each participant.”
